Package framework.meta

Class Summary
MetaConstraint A MetaConstraint is a generalization of the concept of constraint in classical CSPs.
MetaConstraintSolver A meta-CSP is a high-level CSP whose variables and/or constraints are defined implicitly.
MetaVariable MetaVariables are objects used by MetaConstraintSolvers for backtracking search.
MetaVariableConstraintNetwork A constraint network for meta-CSPs.
MultiMetaConstraint  
NullConstraintNetwork A special constraint network which is used to represent terminal nodes in the search space of the MetaConstraintSolver.
